page.title: 09The School
page.content:
Sutton on Trent Primary School has 98 pupils.They start school at 5 and go on to Tuxford Comprehensive School at 11 years old. The school catchment area includes Sutton, Carlton and Grassthorpe. The Head Teacher is Mrs. Robins, the other teachers are Mrs. Proctor, Mrs.Ellis and Mrs. Munro.
There is a very modern building and a Victorian building. The children learn to read, write and do Maths. They also learn Environmental Studies and lots of Science. The school is also a social centre for the village and holds lots of functions. Villagers raise lots of money for the school.
